step_feedback.feedback: Good job starting with closed fists and drawn-in arms. Keep those muscles tight as you inhale.
Excellent! You opened your fingers and extended your arms horizontally. Remember to exhale as you relax.
Great job returning to the starting position with fists closed and arms in. Tighten those muscles and inhale.
Nicely done opening your fingers and extending your arms again. Exhale and relax your muscles.
Fantastic! You completed the first repetition. Keep up the good work with controlled movements.
Good start for your second rep! Remember to keep your fists closed and muscles tight as you inhale.
Well done opening your fingers and extending your arms. Exhale and relax your muscles as you return.
Great job returning to the starting position. Keep those fists closed and muscles tight for the next movement.
Excellent extension! Open your fingers wide and extend arms horizontally. Remember to exhale and relax.
You've successfully completed both repetitions! Your movements were controlled and followed the instructions well.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the Horizontal Pumping exercise! You consistently closed your fists, tightened muscles, and extended your arms horizontally while breathing correctly. Keep up this excellent form for effective lymphatic drainage.
